author: paras25619@gmail.com
name: deep-knowledge-agent
description: Deep Knowledge Agent is an AI-powered research assistant designed to perform in-depth analysis on complex topics by aggregating information from multiple reliable sources. It breaks down queries into sub-topics, validates facts, connects insights across domains, and delivers structured, well-reasoned outputs—making it ideal for deep research, technical exploration, and knowledge synthesis rather than surface-level answers.

environment_variables.description: OpenRouter API key for LLM calls
Mem0 API key for memory operations
